name: cbvexv1

stmt.origin: 3bitr4i(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))

|- wb(wex(s0, w0), wex(s1, w1))

-| wb(wex(s0, w0), wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))
-| wb(wex(s1, w1), wn(wal(s1, wn(w1))))

comment: Version of ~ cbvex with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-13 . See ~ cbvexvw for a version with two disjoint variable conditions, requiring fewer axioms, and ~ cbvexv for another variant. (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.)
